blur_detection.description: The receipt exhibits slight blurring but text remains generally readable.
blur_detection.recommendation: For better quality, hold the camera steady and ensure proper focus when capturing receipt images.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt shows adequate contrast between text and background but some areas appear faded.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: Ensure good lighting conditions when capturing receipts to improve contrast between text and background.

glare_identification.description: No significant glare or reflections are present on the receipt image.
glare_identification.recommendation: Continue capturing receipts in environments without direct light sources causing reflections.

water_stains.description: No water damage or staining is visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: Continue to keep receipts dry and protected from liquids.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt shows visible creases and slight wrinkles that affect the image quality in some areas.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: Flatten receipts before scanning or photographing to minimize the impact of creases and folds.

cut_off_detection.description: The receipt appears to be fully captured within the frame with no cut-off edges.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: Continue to ensure the entire receipt is within the camera frame when capturing images.

missing_sections.description: All standard receipt sections appear to be present including header, line items, and totals.
missing_sections.recommendation: Continue capturing complete receipts with all relevant information visible.

obstructions.description: No fingers, shadows, or other obstructions are visible on the receipt image.
obstructions.recommendation: Continue to keep hands and objects away from the receipt when capturing images.
